text: I saw this plane coming towards me and I
thought gosh she's extremely low I
thought is that allowed it's a jet you
know and then I thought he is very low
he's going to crash and then I thought
my whole life flashed me and what I
didn't flash before me I mean that's
ridiculous to say that but you just in a
split second he was by my my right
periphery and he was smack went smack on
the carriageway and just like a bomb
just went off it just burst into a ball
of flame and smoke and then the next
thing I knew I look forward and I saw
this ball of flame in front of a fire in
front of me with all sorts of bits and
pieces in the in it and I thought what
the heck do I do and I thought I sit
here and wait and see what happens or
just try and get out of it so I put my
foot on the accelerator try and get out
of it i think the air lifted lifted it
over the top of me and then i stopped a
Dane and looked back and saw that
everything was on fire and there were
people running everywhere there was a
car where the top is completely sliced
off behind me and fought on fire and I
thought what do i do and i thought
there's so much aviation fuel around
there could be another explosion and i
said all of the emergency services will
be coming soon they'll want to come down
this side of the carriageway because
it's the only bit that's empty so I
thought the best thing I can just get
out of there and I was a couple of
seconds from work so I thought the best
thing I can do is I needed people
because I was on my own I thought the
best thing I can do is go to work I know
people you know will be there to talk to
and they were brilliant soon as I got to
work there were people sitting outside
the staff entrance having their coffee
and I knew something was wrong and they
all just came and helped me and they're
brilliant
